label: Love
description: Seeks to protect, unite with, or redeem someone. Collides with duty or ambition; destiny often tests the price of devotion.

label: Belonging
description: Craves acceptance within a group or culture. Drives choices around reputation and secrecy; external conflict targets exclusion.

label: Freedom
description: Pursues autonomy from control or circumstance. Aligns with rebel/outlaw roles; tests whether liberty is personal or collective.

label: Justice
description: Aims to set wrongs right within a moral or legal frame. Pairs with judge/warrior; clashes with corrupt systems and personal vengeance.

label: Revenge
description: Seeks payback for injury or loss. Fuels relentless plots but risks fatal flaws (vindictiveness) and tragic destinies.

label: Redemption
description: Yearns to atone for past harm. Interlocks with backstory catalysts; external trials offer proof of change.

label: Power
description: Desires control over people, systems, or outcomes. Useful against chaos but corrupting when ends justify means.

label: Legacy
description: Wants to be remembered or to build enduring structures. Drives creator, ruler, visionary arcs; conflicts with short‑term mercy.

label: Survival
description: Focuses on staying alive or keeping others alive. Clarifies stakes and justifies morally gray choices under pressure.

label: Discovery
description: Pursues knowledge, lands, or truths. Fuels explorer/sage arcs; secrets and taboos are central obstacles.

label: Mastery
description: Seeks unparalleled skill in a domain. Supports magician/engineer arcs; risks obsession and isolation.

label: Order
description: Desires stability and predictability. Pairs with ruler/judge; threatened by rebels and tricksters.

label: Chaos
description: Embraces disruption to break stagnation. Catalyzes change but can leave ruin; tests whether creation follows destruction.

label: Wealth
description: Accumulates resources to enable status or security. Drives merchant arcs; conflicts with generosity and integrity.

label: Faith
description: Pursues alignment with a spiritual or philosophical truth. Interlocks with priest/prophet roles; heresy and doubt fuel internal conflict.

label: Truth
description: Seeks reality behind appearances. Core for detectives; secrecy and propaganda are primary foes.

label: Protection
description: Guards people, places, or ideals. Drives guardian arcs; destiny often tests what cannot be saved.

label: Ambition
description: Climbs hierarchies to reach influence. Pairs with leader/strategist; risks betrayal and hollow victory.

label: Pleasure
description: Chases sensory or aesthetic delight. Lightens tone but can shade into addiction or neglect.

label: Control
description: Needs to manage variables to feel safe. Efficient in crises but stifling to others; pairs with anxiety.

label: Anarchy
description: Seeks to abolish imposed authority. Compatible with outlaw circles; destiny asks what fills the vacuum.

label: Equality
description: Fights to level power imbalances. External conflict is systemic; reputation as radical or reformer follows.

label: Honor
description: Upholds a code above convenience. Fuels warrior/knight arcs; tragic when code clashes with compassion.

label: Curiosity
description: Wants to know simply because not knowing itches. Lowers thresholds to risk; often triggers plot inciting incidents.

label: Protection of Nature
description: Defends ecosystems or spirits. Aligns with ranger/druid archetypes; industrial external conflicts loom.

label: Progress
description: Drives innovation and reform. Pairs with engineer/visionary; antagonized by tradition and fear.

label: Tradition
description: Preserves ancestral ways and identities. Clashes with progress; secrets of origin become central stakes.

label: Reconciliation
description: Seeks to mend broken relationships. Relies on forgiveness and truth; reputations must be renegotiated.

label: Glory
description: Craves recognition through deeds. Works for warriors and athletes; risks vanity and reckless feats.

label: Security
description: Builds safety nets against threat. Motivates cautious strategies; can harden into xenophobia if warped by fear.

label: Transcendence
description: Yearns to surpass human limits or ego. Powers mystic, artist, and scientist arcs; dangers include cultism.

label: Revolution
description: Aims to overturn an order entirely. Demands coalition and sacrifice; destiny asks who becomes the new ruler.

label: Rescue
description: Focuses on saving a person or group. Tight time frames amplify stakes; moral clarity is tested by costs.

label: Reputation
description: Seeks honor, fame, or respect. Intertwines with external image and secret shame; destiny can be hollow.

label: Balance
description: Tries to hold competing goods together. Diplomatic motivation that risks paralysis; mastery of trade‑offs is key.

label: Healing
description: Repairs harm to body, mind, or society. Combines well with caregiver; external forces profit from continued wounds.

label: Justice‑tempered‑with‑Mercy
description: Seeks right outcomes without cruelty. A difficult, nuanced aim that stresses internal conflict.

label: Belief in Others
description: Works to unlock others’ potential. Ideal for mentors; reputation grows with their students.

label: Belief in Self
description: Needs to prove worthiness. Drives everyman arcs; internal conflict centers on confidence vs. humility.

label: Unity
description: Strives to draw disparate factions together. External conflict is factionalism; secrets can shatter progress at any time.
